{{Description|Kaeya seems affable, but his nature is that of unyielding ice.}}
'''Frostgnaw''' is [[Kaeya]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*{{TalentNote|particles|2.67}}
**With [[Glacial Heart]], Kaeya's 4th Ascension Passive, each '''[[Frozen]]''' enemy grants 1 additional particle (max 2 additional particles).
*This skill can hit multiple enemies within a certain angle, dealing individual instances of damage with individual chances to CRIT.
*Frostgnaw's {{Cryo}} application is unusually strong on [[water]] and [[Frozen|freezes]] it for 9 seconds. As Frostgnaw's cooldown is only 6 seconds, Kaeya can freeze the water in front of him and walk across it indefinitely as long as Frostgnaw is constantly used. This is colloquially known as "ice bridging."
*{{TalentNote|character=Kaeya|talent=Frostgnaw|ascension|1|Cold-Blooded Strike}}
*{{TalentNote|character=Kaeya|talent=Frostgnaw|ascension|2|Glacial Heart}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
*{{TalentNote|constellation|3|Dance of Frost}}
